column4: I have another one for you folks... I'm running XP on my first HDD, and I have Ubuntu running on my second HDD. At the moment I boot straight into Ubuntu. I want to modify the grub menu file, but I don't remember how the HDD are identified in grub. Anyone want to shoot me a quick refresher? Is my first disk, first partition " (hd 0,0)"?
Sweet! It's coming back to me.....I think... :-/

yeah, I think its (hd0,0) where the first 0 is harddrive, and the second 0 is partition
